Title: Provides for state reimbursement for lost tax revenue due to devaluation of land as a result of toxic contamination
Summary: Provides for state reimbursement for lost tax revenue due to devaluation of land as a result of toxic contamination.
LawCode: Add ยง54-n, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to providing state reimbursement for lost tax revenue due to devaluation of land subject to toxic contamination
